stories.title: User Registration
stories.description: As a new user, I want to register with my email and password so that I can access the application securely.
acceptance_criteria: Password complexity enforced (min 8 chars, special characters)

stories.title: User Login/Logout
stories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in/log out to securely access or terminate my session.

stories.title: Password Reset
stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password via email to regain account access.

stories.title: View/Update Profile
stories.description: As a user, I want to view and edit my profile details to keep information current.

stories.title: Upload Profile Picture
stories.description: As a user, I want to upload a profile photo for identification.

stories.title: CRUD Items
stories.description: As a user, I want to create, read, update, and delete items to manage my data.

stories.title: Search & Filter
stories.description: As a user, I want to search/filter items to find specific entries quickly.

stories.title: In-App Notifications
stories.description: As a user, I want notifications for actions (e.g., 'Item updated').
